title: Emerging-Market Assets Slide With AI Woes, Caution on US Data
description: Indexes for emerging-market assets declined as concerns persisted around AI-related stocks, and traders stepped back from boosting wagers on more Federal Reserve rate cuts following the latest US jobs data.

title: Bitcoin's Great Run Will Continue, MARA's Thiel Says
description: MARA Holdings CEO Fred Thiel is not discouraged by the recent performance of Bitcoin. It's down about 30% from its record high of more than $126,000. He says a risk-off environment is driving investors away from Bitcoin for now and we're just seeing some "healthy retracement." (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Investors Are Being Discerning With the AI Trade: BMO’s Schleif
description: Carol Schleif, chief market strategist at BMO Private Wealth, says investors are being discerning by putting money into both the public and private side of the AI trade. She joins Caroline Hyde on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)
